scripts.build: npm run build-front -s && npm run clean-back -s && npm run build-msg && mvn clean package -f firebase-admin && npm run done-msg -s
scripts.build-msg: npm run div-msg -s && echo "\033[35m* ~~~~~~~~~~~ \033[32mPackaging into Jar... \033[35m~~~~~~~~~~~ *" && npm run div-msg -s
scripts.build-front: npm run build-front-msg -s && npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run done-msg -s
scripts.build-front-msg: npm run div-msg -s && echo "\033[35m* ~~~~~~~~~~~~ \033[32mBuilding Frontend... \033[35m~~~~~~~~~~~~ *" && npm run div-msg -s
scripts.clean-back: npm run clean-back-msg -s && mvn clean -f firebase-admin && npm run done-msg -s
scripts.clean-back-msg: npm run div-msg -s && echo "\033[35m* ~~~~~~~~~~~~ \033[32mCleaning Backend... \033[35m~~~~~~~~~~~~ *" && npm run div-msg -s
scripts.deps: npm run deps-msg -s && npm i --prefix frontend -s && npm run done-msg -s
scripts.deps-msg: npm run div-msg -s -s && echo "\033[35m* ~~~~~~~~~ \033[32mInstalling Dependencies...\033[35m ~~~~~~~~~ *" && npm run div-msg -s
scripts.menu: npm run title-msg -s && npm run line-brk-msg -s && echo "\033[35mFollow these steps to get ClassMate up and running:" && npm run line-brk-msg -s && echo "\033[35m'\033[36mnpm run deps\033[35m' - \033[32mInstalls dependencies" && echo "\033[35m'\033[36mnpm run build\033[35m' - \033[32mBuilds and packages ClassMate into jar" && echo "\033[35m'\033[36mnpm run classmate\033[35m' - \033[32mRuns ClassMate" && npm run line-brk-msg -s
scripts.start-msg: npm run div-msg -s -s && echo "\033[35m* ~~~~~~~~~~~ \033[32mStarting \033[33mClassMate\033[32m...\033[35m ~~~~~~~~~~~ *" && npm run div-msg -s
scripts.title-msg: npm run small-div-msg -s && echo "\033[35m* ~~ \033[33mClassMate. \033[35m~~ *" && npm run small-div-msg -s
